thread.title: Ryan Reynolds Says Blake Lively is a Better Kisser Than Andrew Garfield
thread.title_full: Ryan Reynolds Says Blake Lively is a Better Kisser Than Andrew Garfield

author: Just Jared
title: Ryan Reynolds Says Blake Lively is a Better Kisser Than Andrew Garfield
text:
Sorry, Andrew Garfield … Ryan Reynolds has declared that his wife Blake Lively definitely wins the best kisser award! 
After the 40-year-old Deadpool actor and the 33-year-old Amazing Spider‑Man actor locked lips at the Golden Globes last month, Ryan had to set the record straight when recently asked whether Andrew or Blake , 29, took home the prize.
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Ryan Reynolds 
“I’m going to go with my wife on that one, for a number of reasons,” Ryan answered while being honored by Harvard University’s Hasty Pudding Theatricals group on Friday (February 3). 
“Make no mistake,” he added. “ Andrew Garfield is a wonderful kisser. Very generous. A real darting tongue.”
In case you missed it, watch the kissing video here .
